mapper.insert: insert into consumption_item (category_id, category_item_id, pay_type_id, amount, pay_amount, discount_amount, create_user_id, create_time, cno) values (#{category.id}, #{categoryItem.id}, #{payType.id}, #{amount}, #{payAmount}, #{discountAmount}, #{createUserId}, #{createTime}, #{cno})
mapper.update: update consumption_item set category_id = #{category.id}, category_item_id = #{categoryItem.id}, pay_type_id = #{payType.id}, amount = #{amount}, pay_amount = #{payAmount}, discount_amount = #{discountAmount}, create_user_id = #{createUserId}, create_time = #{createTime}, cno = #{cno} where id = #{id}
